description: At CarMitsu, our specialty isn't just cars – it's the passion and dedication we put into every Mitsubishi vehicle we service. We are an independent service center that proudly provides comprehensive care for your car, combining extensive experience with modern technology.

about.title: Specialized Mitsubishi Car Service
description: CarMitsu is an automotive company with years of experience specializing in the repair and servicing of Mitsubishi vehicles. Our history began with a passion for legendary off-road vehicles: the Mitsubishi Pajero, L200, and Hyundai Galloper. This passion has evolved into a professional service that today offers high-quality services for a wide range of Mitsubishi vehicles.

At CarMitsu, we understand that your Mitsubishi car is more than just a means of transportation – it's a part of your lifestyle. As an independent service specializing in the Mitsubishi brand, we offer a full range of services to ensure that your vehicle is always in excellent condition and ready for any adventure.

services.title: What Can We Do for You?

carOverview.title: Routine and Periodic Inspection and Repair
carOverview.description: Engine and gearbox, suspension, timing belt, clutch, braking system...

guaranteeOverview.title: Car Inspection During Warranty Period
guaranteeOverview.description: Checking the technical condition of all car systems while maintaining the warranty

computerDiagnostics.title: Computer Diagnostics
computerDiagnostics.description: Quick and accurate assessment of the technical condition of individual vehicle systems and components

carElectric.title: Car Electrics
carElectric.description: Electromechanics, automotive electrical systems, controller repair

oilChange.title: Oil and Consumables Replacement
oilChange.description: Engine, gearbox, differential, power steering system

airConditioning.title: Air Conditioning Service
airConditioning.description: Regardless of the season, your air conditioning will work flawlessly thanks to our specialized services
